title: SoundClouds, Participatory Music Generation Exhibition
conference: A participatory music exhibition that generates real-time soundscapes through user interactions with inflatables. Developed an object detection model by fine-tuning YOLO, achieving 98.3% accuracy, in collaboration with music technologists and visual artists.

title: FORECST, Online Hackathon Website
conference: A full-stack website built with React.js and Firebase during COVID-19 to host virtual hackathons for novice programmers.

title: PINTOS: Operating Systems and Lab
conference: Implemented kernel threads, user program execution, file system, and virtual memory in a full operating system framework for the 80x86 architecture using C. Ran and tested the OS on the QEMU simulator.

title: MYFIT, Clothing Size Recommendation Android Application
conference: An Android application developed in Java to enhance the online clothing shopping experience by providing visualizations of clothing sizes. It is currently in the process of preparing for a startup launch.
